item.description:
Ok folks....since our first outting prooved to be a success, we need to do it again, but even BIGGER!! Please bring friends and family along. The Enfield public needs to see us as a constant reminder that they must be vigilent and studious.

Don't forget to attend the biweekly meetings of the CT Patriot Alliance so you can learn more about your constitutional rights. I will be going from now on, that's for sure.

We are parking behind the white/red building that used to be a Broyhill furniture outlet. They are out of business so I don't think anyone will mind. If it is hot, be sure to bring water and a camping chair if it is difficult for you to stand for the entire hour. Remember, it is your presence that counts!!!

See you next week!!!

In patriotism,

Carole
item.name: Saturday Weekly Mini "T" in Enfield
